column4: good day, i am having trouble connecting redhat to tiscali ADSL.
I have put the modem in to bridge mode and have tried pppoe but i
think the connection needs to be pppoa, i have tried the module
but no success, has anybody tried this before (and yes i should
upgrade but this is for something that i need the old redhat for)
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
